front: Security Group vs NACL — core difference?
back: SG: stateful, allow-only, attached to ENI. NACL: stateless, allow+deny, subnet level.

front: Private S3 access from private subnets?
back: Use S3 Gateway VPC Endpoint; remove NAT data processing cost.
ALB=L7 HTTP; NLB=L4 TCP/UDP, static IP; GWLB=appliances via GENEVE.
One writer + replicas in other AZs for fast failover.

front: Best for steady 24/7 with flexibility across families?
